page.title: 03TRAFFIC ON THE B1190
page.content: The busiest times were at 1pm when people were going back to work. It was also quite busy from 9.45 to 10.15. There were only 4 buses that passed the school in the 5\ hours, travelling to Lincoln or Horncastle. Most of the tractors went past the school during the last \ hour between 2.30 and 3.00.Most of these were leading silage to Mr Barter's Post Office Farm. 10 out of the 101 lorries that went past the school came at 12.00 to 12.15. The two horses were being ridden for pleasure. During the period October to January, the sugar beet factory in Bardney is taking in beet. At that time of year, many more lorries and tractors pass the school.
